details.about: Welcome to Wibu Store, where you can by whatever game you want. This webpage is built inspired by Epic Game Store and Steam. I have built this using a lot of technologies. Firstly, the front-end part is built by React. Secondly, the server is constructed under the microservices architecture. We have a RESTful API server that handles the requests from front-end part. Next, we have other microservices: data analysis server (dedicated for data analysis and recommendation), MySQL server, search engine and redis server (cache server).

A cheap clone version of messenger app. You can use it to chat with friends. You can add, remove friend, create new chat,.... This application is implemented by 2 parts. The first part is front-end built by React. Next, the server part is built by JavaScript.

A city-building game programmed by Python (using Pygame). This game is inspired by Caesar III (a city-building game of series Caesar), but improved by the network part allowing players to play in co-op mode (multiple-player). The network part is implemented by C
